3. Injunctive Relief. Member acknowledges that any failure to comply with the requirements of this Agreement will cause Franchisor irreparable injury, and Member agrees to pay all court costs and reasonable attorney's fees incurred by Franchisor in obtaining specific performance of, or an injunction against violation of, the requirements of this Agreement.
perturbation.explanation: Moving the injunctive relief clause to the section regarding delay makes it harder to enforce, as it implies injunctive relief is only applicable when there is a delay, instead of any failure to comply with the requirements of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: 6. Third-Party Beneficiary. Member hereby acknowledges and agrees that Franchisor is an intended third-party beneficiary of this Agreement with the right to enforce it, independently or jointly with Franchisee.
perturbation.changed_text: 6. Third-Party Beneficiary. Member hereby acknowledges and agrees that Franchisor *may be* an intended third-party beneficiary of this Agreement with the right to enforce it, independently or jointly with Franchisee.
